claim: Robert Bolt was the screenwriter for The Bounty.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Robert Oxton Bolt , CBE  (  August 15 , 1924 -- February 21 , 1995  )  was an English playwright and a two-time Oscar-winning screenwriter , known for writing the screenplays for Lawrence of Arabia , Doctor Zhivago and A Man for All Seasons , the latter two of which won him the Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay .
